snippet: China’s Central Bank said it would raise interest rates for the first time in nearly three years, apparently in the hopes of dampening inflation and cooling off the hot property market.

snippet: China’s announcement that it would raise interest rates weighed on the market, and investors found disappointment in earnings reports from Apple and I.B.M.
